object.name: InlineQueryResultAudio
object.description:
Represents a link to an MP3 audio file. By default, this audio file will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the audio.
Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will ignore them.
object.html_description:
Represents a link to an MP3 audio file. By default, this audio file will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the audio.

Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will ignore them.
object.rst_description:
Represents a link to an MP3 audio file. By default, this audio file will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use *input_message_content* to send a message with the specified content instead of the audio.
**Note:** This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will ignore them.

annotations.description: Type of the result, must be audio
annotations.rst_description: Type of the result, must be *audio*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: A valid URL for the audio file
annotations.html_description: A valid URL for the audio file
annotations.rst_description: A valid URL for the audio file
annotations.name: audio_url

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the audio caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the audio caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Mode for parsing entities in the audio caption. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: caption_entities

annotations.description: Inline keyboard attached to the message
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: Content of the message to be sent instead of the audio
annotations.html_description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the audio
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Content of the message to be sent instead of the audio
annotations.name: input_message_content
